message.body: are you filing my tuition from massart as an education credit? if not, should I file it? and if so, how much was my tuition?
I don't think I can do it from a tax standpoint, but I'll check with my accountant when I see him next Saturday to prepare filing of tax return. $$$$$
Ok. I think I can file it if u don't. Let me know.
If both of us can file we should figure out who's the one who stands to benefit the most, and you get the profit or savings anyway!
